t: The Kabbalah Centre hired branding experts Base Design to reach the "spiritual-but-not-religious" generation
s: July 20, 2022 - Can branding help save souls? At a time when more and more Americans are turning away from formal religion, a range of faiths are borrowing tactics from brand design to reach new audiences. A shining example is the Kabbalah Centre’s recent collaboration with the branding gurus at Base Design.
